title: Investigate Fraudulent SIM Activity
description: The system flags a SIM card for making an unusually high volume of international calls, indicating potential fraud.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the fraud alert and retrieve the call history for the flagged SIM.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves logs showing thousands of calls to a premium-rate number.

tasks.description: Immediately suspend the SIM card to prevent further fraudulent activity.
Create a report for the fraud analysis team, including the call logs and total potential financial loss.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed and accurate fraud report.
